text: Ke yiniharu dharatima ghumaphira garenan taki dekhdathe ki ti manisaharuko parinama kasto bhayo, jo uniharubhanda pahila gujrisakeka chan? Uniharu sakti ra dharatima aphna cinhaharuko drstile yiniharubhanda badhi thi'e, ani uniharuko papako karana allahale uniharula'i samatihalyo. Ra allahako sajayabata uniharula'i baca'unevala kohi thi'ena
